subject: Ticket Scalping
Prices (Fares, Fees and Rates)
Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: The asking price of Super Bowl tickets being resold has fallen nearly 25 percent since the game’s participants became known, according to a market tracker, though a surge is expected.
snippet: The asking price of Super Bowl tickets being resold has fallen nearly 25 percent since the game’s participants became known, according to a market tracker, though a surge is expected.
